explains: adj. 非凡的，杰出的；感觉得到的，可感知的；现象的

sentences.en: It is predicted that this phenomenal growth will have a great impact on our society and economy.
sentences.cn: 据预测，这种显著的增长将对我们的社会和经济产生重大影响。

sentences.en: The product has been a phenomenal success.
sentences.cn: 这一产品获得了极大的成功。

sentences.en: Exports of Australian wine are growing at a phenomenal rate.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚葡萄酒的出口正以惊人的速度增长。
